focus_items.title: Building Agentic Workflows
focus_items.description: I am currently deep-diving into **multi-agent orchestration**. Moving beyond simple prompt engineering to building systems where specialized agents (Researcher, Coder, Reviewer) collaborate to solve complex tasks autonomously.

focus_items.title: Refactoring 'Yourgency'
focus_items.description: Polishing a custom React 19 / Vite 6 CRM. I'm focusing on the **Lead Scraper** module‚Äîoptimizing the Google Maps extraction logic to ensure 100% data fidelity for local business prospecting.

focus_items.title: Reading
focus_items.description:
"Thinking, Fast and Slow" by Daniel Kahneman.
Re-reading to better understand system-1 vs. system-2 thinking, specifically to model how LLMs trigger "reasoning" chains vs. instant token prediction.
